displayProperties.name: The Pantheon: Atraks Sovereign
displayProperties.description: Power Level: Combatants in this activity are 5 points over your current Power level.

displayProperties.name: Hardware Focus
displayProperties.description:
All abilities are disabled! Weapons are your only defense.

Collect Special ammo and Heavy ammo from crates around the map.

displayProperties.name: Onslaught Rules
displayProperties.description:
Defend and repair the ADU against waves of combatants. There are 10 waves to a set.

ADU: If the ADU is destroyed, the activity ends.

Scraps: An in-activity currency. They are earned by scoring and used to purchase and upgrade defenses at the start of every set and after waves 3 and 6.

Rewards: Paid out after every set upon defeating the boss wave. Subsequent sets pay out better rewards. Legend increases rewards.

Bonus Objectives: Rewards resources, vendor reputation, and armaments.

displayProperties.name: Competitive Division Rules
displayProperties.description:
This playlist contains Collision and Survival. When you launch, it will randomly select one of the modes for you to play.

Collision: To win, score more points than your opponents by capturing and controlling the zone. There will be one zone active at a time. Defeating your opponents does not directly grant points.

Survival: To win, your team must become the last Guardian(s) standing by defeating the opposing team to exhaust their revives.

displayProperties.name: New Territory
displayProperties.description:
This playlist features three new Crucible maps: Dissonance, Eventide Labs, and Cirrus Plaza.

It features four randomized modes: Collision, Clash, Survival, and Elimination.

displayProperties.name: Escalating Difficulty
displayProperties.description: Power is fixed and starts at 10 below opponents. Power decreases by 5 with each set.

displayProperties.name: The Pantheon Rules
displayProperties.description:
• Complete raid encounters in succession. Activate the transmat banner after completing an encounter to progress to the next arena.
• Each encounter has a bonus timer. You earn additional points while the timer is active. Finish the encounter before the timer runs out for additional score.
• Completing encounters, and completing encounters with a high score, grant rewards. Remaining rewards for The Pantheon are tracked on the Triumphs page.
• Arcite 99-40 is waiting at the end of The Pantheon for the Guardians who have completed the "Divine Weaponry" quests.

displayProperties.name: Escalating Difficulty
displayProperties.description: Power is fixed and starts at 0 below opponents. Power decreases by 4 with each set.

displayProperties.name: Matchmaking
displayProperties.description: Matchmaking prefers to avoid players with widely disparate skills.

displayProperties.name: Paracausal Focus
displayProperties.description:
All weapons are disabled! Abilities are your only defense.

Your abilities recharge much faster, and your camera is set to third person.

displayProperties.name: Weekly Boss
displayProperties.description: This week, a Fieldrazer Tormentor awaits you on wave 50.

displayProperties.name: Class Warfare
displayProperties.description: Using class abilities increases your fireteam's damage output. Reduces incoming damage while active.

displayProperties.name: Matchmaking
displayProperties.description:
When on an Unflawed Card, matchmaking does not utilize skill.

When on a Flawed Card, matchmaking prefers players with similar weekly performance in Trials of Osiris.

displayProperties.name: Weekly Boss
displayProperties.description: This week, a Siegehook Ogre awaits you on wave 50.

displayProperties.name: The Pantheon: Rhulk Indomitable
displayProperties.description: Power Level: Combatants in this activity are 15 points over your current Power level.

displayProperties.name: Weekly Boss
displayProperties.description: This week, a Fallen Warpriest awaits you on wave 50.

displayProperties.name: Matchmaking
displayProperties.description: Matchmaking prefers players with similar Glory Rank.

displayProperties.name: On the Clock
displayProperties.description: This activity is timed. If your fireteam fails to complete the activity in the allotted time, everyone is returned to orbit.

displayProperties.name: The Pantheon: Oryx Exalted
displayProperties.description: Power Level: Combatants in this activity are 10 points over your current Power level.

displayProperties.name: Delayed Extinguish
displayProperties.description:
Activates on wave 31.

If your fireteam falls, everyone is returned to orbit.

displayProperties.name: Extinguish
displayProperties.description: If your fireteam falls in a Restricted Zone, everyone is returned to orbit.

displayProperties.name: Matchmaking
displayProperties.description: Matchmaking does not utilize skill.

displayProperties.name: The Pantheon: Nezarec Sublime
displayProperties.description: Power Level: Combatants in this activity are 20 points over your current Power level.

displayProperties.name: Shot Caller
displayProperties.description: Landing multiple precision hits with a Primary ammo weapon empowers Special and Heavy ammo weapons. Reduces incoming damage while active.
